articles.title: 'Barbie' crosses $1 billion at global box office, a first for a woman-directed film - India Today
articles.description: 'Barbie', directed by Greta Gerwig, surpasses the $1 billion mark at the global box office, becoming the second film this year to achieve that milestone. This is the first film led by a female director to achieve this milestone.
